title: Music Generations 70's
description: Music Generations 70’s is a unique music pack, made for game developers who need 70’s-like realistic music loops
longDescription:
PRODUCED BY TAO & SOUND (Custom audio)


Music Playlist


Music Generations 70’s is a unique music pack, made for game developers who need 70’s-like realistic music loops for their videogames or for those devs who wish to enhance their games or apps with funk, disco, discofunk, soul or even progressive rock music.


Give your project that genuine 70’s discofunk style you are looking for! These loops are suitable for runner, platformer, adventure or puzzle gameplay, in-game radio stations, main menus, credits scene, story scenes or background music for apps.


contact@taoandsound.com
technicalDetails:
Music Generations 70’s contains 8 original high quality music tracks and 22 additional background music files (e.g. bass and drums only or melody only) carefuly chosen to offer more versatility for the different scenes of your game.

Number of Audio tracks: 30
Number of Audio Cues: 30
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many sound FX: no fx
How many minutes of audio provided: 33’52”
Engine Compatibility: Unreal 4.8.2

Main Themes:
• All is Funk 1:28
• Beating Funky Levels 1:34
• Disco Adventure 1:20
• Jump and Discofunk 1:33
• Pure 70s Gameplay 1:36
• Relaxing Soul 1:16
• Run for the Rhythm 1:24
• World is Progressive 1:40
